info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.ai_data.bfdp.subscription
info.description: Use this API to subscribe to BFDP

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

subscriptionSubscribeRequest.description: Request to subscribe to BFDP CMS
subscriptionSubscribeRequest.title: SubscribeRequest

product_name.description:
F5 product's pipeline object name .

Example: ` "product name"`
product_name.title: product_name

subscriptionSubscribeResponse.description: Response of subscribe to BFDP CMS
subscriptionSubscribeResponse.title: SubscribeResponse

configured_tenant_id.description:
F5 product's pipeline configured tenant .

Example: ` "Configured Tenant"`
configured_tenant_id.title: configured_tenant_id

pipeline_id.description:
F5 product's pipeline id for which this tenant is configured.    

Example: ` "pipleine_id"`
pipeline_id.title: pipleine_id

pipeline_name.description:
F5 product's pipeline name for which this tenant is configured.

Example: ` "pipeline_name"`
pipeline_name.title: pipeline_name

token.description:
F5 product's pipeline token to ingest data .

Example: ` "token name"`
token.title: token
